Critical Failure The creature wastes the action and can't attempt to attack the target for the rest of sanctuary's duration.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description:
You raise a magical shield of force. This counts as using the Raise a Shield action, giving you a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn, but it doesn't require a hand to use.

While the spell is in effect, you can use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block} reaction with your magic shield. The shield has Hardness 5. You can use the spell's reaction to reduce damage from any spell or magical effect, even if it doesn't deal physical damage. After you use Shield Block, the spell ends and you can't cast it again for 10 minutes.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Jemq5UknGdMO7b73]{Spell Effect: Shield}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.QF6RDlCoTvkVHRo4]{Effect: Shield Immunity}

Heightened (+2) The shield's Hardness increases by 5.

equipment-Sawtooth Saber.name: Sawtooth Saber
equipment-Sawtooth Saber.description: The signature weapon of the Red Mantis assassins, this curved blade is serrated like a saw, hence the name.

equipment-Mantis Shell.name: Mantis Shell
equipment-Mantis Shell.description: Construction of mantis shell armor originates with the Red Mantis assassins. Authentic mantis shell can be found in some dark markets, but wearing such armor can attract deadly attention from the armor's originators. Mantis shell comes with the weapon harness adjustment, though these special vambraces are meant to hold sawtooth sabers, and attaching anything else is an insult to the Red Mantis. A character who is a member of the Red Mantis assassins has access to this uncommon armor.

equipment-Bracers of Strength.name: Bracers of Strength
equipment-Bracers of Strength.description:
Etchings of powerful bears decorate these brass bracers. You gain a +3 item bonus to Athletics checks and a +2 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to lift a heavy object, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SjmKHgI7a5Z9JzBx]{Force Open}. When you invest the bracers, you either increase your Strength modifier by 1 or increase it to +4, whichever would give you a higher value.

Activate—Bear Hug 1 (manipulate)

Attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} a creature. If you succeed, you crush the creature in your grasp, dealing @Damage[(@actor.abilities.str.mod)[bludgeoning]]{bludgeoning} damage to it equal to your Strength modifier. If you critically succeeded, the damage is equal to double your Strength modifier, and the creature suffocates as long as it remains @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} by you.

Catch and Release.name: 捕捉释放 Catch and Release
Catch and Release.description:
需求 狂怒骑手有一只空手

触发 一个敌人用投掷武器攻击狂怒骑手大失败

效果 狂怒骑手抓住投掷武器并用它进行一次远程打击。

Exquisite Kokogiak Harness.name: 精制品雪梦熊鞍具 Exquisite Kokogiak Harness
Exquisite Kokogiak Harness.description: 狂怒骑手在骑乘雪梦熊时会装备一套精致的鞍具。使用这种鞍具时，两个狂怒骑手可以同骑一只自愿的雪梦熊，同时他们的双手都保持空手状态。当狂怒骑手骑在雪梦熊身上时，TA无法使用任何使用自身速度的动作（比如快步或行走），且所有强迫狂怒骑手移动或将其从坐骑上击倒的DC都增加5。如果狂怒骑手骑乘的、装有此类鞍具的雪梦熊被杀或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]，狂怒骑手因坠落受到@Damage[3d6[bludgeoning]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:30|basic]豁免）。狂怒骑手可以用一个交互动作卸下鞍具。

Ruinous Rage.name: 毁灭狂暴 Ruinous Rage
Ruinous Rage.description: 狂怒骑手进入纯粹的狂暴状态，持续1分钟，直到附近不再有可被感知到的敌人或TA@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]为止，以先到者为准。狂暴时，狂怒骑手的AC为27，且矛打击造成2d6+15伤害附加2d6持续流血伤害。狂暴时，狂怒骑手无法使用带有专注特征的动作，除了@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]。狂暴停止后，狂怒骑手1分钟内无法再狂暴。

equipment-Spear.name: Spear
equipment-Spear.description: A long metal shaft ending with a metal spike, a spear can be used one-handed as a melee weapon and can be thrown.

equipment-Studded Leather Armor.name: Studded Leather Armor
equipment-Studded Leather Armor.description: This leather armor is reinforced with metal studs and sometimes small metal plates, providing most of the flexibility of leather armor with more robust protection.

Spider Legs.name: Spider Legs
Spider Legs.description:
Requirements The jorogumo is in humanoid form

Effect Eight large spider legs sprout from the jorogumo's back, granting them a 40-foot climb Speed and allowing them to use the Darting Legs reaction.

Darting Legs.name: Darting Legs
Darting Legs.description:
Requirements The jorogumo has their spider legs extended or has Changed Shape

Trigger The jorogumo is targeted with an attack

Effect The jorogumo raises a leg, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

Change Shape.name: Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
The jorogumo takes on the appearance of any Small or Medium spider. This doesn't change their Speed or Strikes.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Jorogumo Venom.name: Jorogumo Venom
Jorogumo Venom.description:
Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:32]

Maximum Duration 4 hours

Stage 1 @Damage[3d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[3d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[4d6[poison]] damage and Stupefied 2 (1 round)

Stage 4 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} for [[/br 1d4 #Duration Paralyzed]]{1d4 hours}

Web Trap.name: Web Trap
Web Trap.description:
A creature hit by the jorogumo's web attack is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} and stuck to the nearest surface, preventing the creature from moving.

The DC to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SjmKHgI7a5Z9JzBx]{Force Open} the web trap is 32.

Truespeech (Constant).name: Truespeech (Constant)
Truespeech (Constant).description:
The target can understand all words regardless of language and also speak the languages of other creatures. When in a mixed group of creatures, each time the target speaks, it can choose a creature and speak in a language that creature understands, even if the target doesn't know what language that is.

Heightened (7th) The duration is 8 hours.

Confusion.name: Confusion
Confusion.description:
You befuddle your target with strange impulses, causing it to act randomly. The effects are determined by the target's Will save. You can Dismiss the spell.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target babbles incoherently and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} for 1 minute. It can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns to end the confusion.

Critical Failure The target is Confused for 1 minute, with no save to end early.

Heightened (8th) You can target up to 10 creatures.

Suggestion.name: Suggestion
Suggestion.description:
Your honeyed words are difficult for creatures to resist. You suggest a course of action to the target, which must be phrased in such a way as to seem like a logical course of action to the target and can't be self-destructive or obviously against the target's self-interest. The target must attempt a Will save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected and knows you tried to control it.

Success The target is unaffected.

Failure The target immediately follows your suggestion. The spell has a duration of 1 minute, or until the target has completed a finite suggestion or the suggestion becomes self-destructive or has other obvious negative effects.

Critical Failure As failure, but the base duration is 1 hour.

Heightened (8th) You can target up to 10 creatures.

Mind Reading (At Will).name: Mind Reading (At Will)
Mind Reading (At Will).description:
With a cursory mental touch, you attempt to read the target's mind. It must attempt a Will save. The target then becomes temporarily immune to your mind reading for 1 hour.

Critical Success The target perceives vague surface thoughts from you when you Cast the Spell.

Success You find out whether the target's Intelligence modifier is higher than, equal to, or lower than yours.

Failure You perceive vague surface thoughts from the target when you Cast the Spell, and you find out whether its Intelligence is higher than, equal to, or lower than yours.

Critical Failure As failure, and for the duration of the spell, you can Sustain the spell to detect the target's surface thoughts again. The target doesn't receive any additional saves.

Speak with Animals (Constant).name: Speak with Animals (Constant)
Speak with Animals (Constant).description: You can ask questions of, receive answers from, and use the Diplomacy skill with animals. The spell doesn't make them more friendly than normal. Cunning animals are likely to be terse and evasive, while less intelligent ones often make inane comments.

Charm (At Will).name: Charm (At Will)
Charm (At Will).description:
To the target, your words are honey and your visage seems bathed in a dreamy haze. It must attempt a Will save, with a +4 circumstance bonus if you or your allies recently threatened it or used hostile actions against it.

You can Dismiss the spell. If you use hostile actions against the target, the spell ends. When the spell ends, the target doesn't necessarily realize it was charmed unless its friendship with you or the actions you convinced it to take clash with its expectations, meaning you could potentially convince the target to continue being your friend via mundane means.

Critical Success The target is unaffected and aware you tried to charm it.

Success The target is unaffected but thinks your spell was something harmless instead of charm, unless it identifies the spell.

Failure The target's attitude becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.v66R7FdOf11l94im]{Friendly} toward you. If it was Friendly, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.v44P3WUcU1j0115l]{Helpful}. It can't use hostile actions against you.

Critical Failure The target's attitude becomes Helpful toward you, and it can't use hostile actions against you.

Heightened (4th) The duration lasts until the next time you make your daily preparations.

Heightened (8th) The duration lasts until the next time you make your daily preparations, and you can target up to 10 creatures.

Summon Animal (Spiders Only).name: Summon Animal (Spiders Only)
Summon Animal (Spiders Only).description:
You summon a creature that has the animal trait and whose level is –1 to fight for you.

Heightened As listed in the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.S55aqwWIzpQRFhcq.JournalEntryPage.8gcp880pEWZ9VPnF]{summon} trait.

Celasik.name: Celasik
Celasik.publicNotes: Appearing as beautiful, well-dressed humans, jorogumo lurk in the high mountains and prey on travelers. These evil creatures can fully change into a giant spider or sprout spider legs from their backs, and they often keep giant spiders as pets. Jorogumo usually eat their prey, but some humanoids meet an even more gruesome fate as living incubators for jorogumo eggs. Though most jorogumos are solitary creatures, some have taken up worship of Norgorber and serve as valuable allies to thieves' guilds following that god's guise as the Gray Master.

+2 Circumstance to All Saves Vs. Fear.name: 对抗恐惧效果时全豁免+2环境加值

Consecrated.name: 受加护 Consecrated
Consecrated.description: 只要皇冠屯内的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dbd5W6G8U2vzWolN]仪式效果仍存在，古拉姆老兵的攻击、技能、豁免和察觉检定就获得+1状态加值；这些加值并未算入数据栏。

Heavy Swing.name: 重挥 Heavy Swing
Heavy Swing.description: 古拉姆老兵用巨剑进行打击，造成4d12+22挥砍伤害和1d6持续流血伤害。在计算多重攻击减值时，这算作两次攻击。

Pinning Throw.name: 固定投掷 Pinning Throw
Pinning Throw.description: 古拉姆老兵尝试用标枪进行一次远程打击，造成@Damage[(3d6+22)[piercing]]伤害。若目标与一个固体表面邻接，TA被标枪钉在该表面上。目标陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]，直到@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]（DC 33）。若该生物为虚体、液态（比如水元素或一部分泥怪）或其他可以不费吹灰之力逃脱的形态，则不会被固定。

Greatsword Critical Specialization.name: 巨剑重击专精 Greatsword Critical Specialization
Greatsword Critical Specialization.description: 用巨剑造成重击时，被重击目标失去平衡，直到古拉姆老兵下回合开始前陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]。

equipment-Javelin.name: Javelin
equipment-Javelin.description: This thin spear is well balanced for throwing but is not designed for melee use.

equipment-Full Plate.name: Full Plate
equipment-Full Plate.description: Plate mail consists of interlocking plates that encase nearly the entire body in a carapace of steel. It is costly and heavy, and the wearer often requires help to don it correctly, but it provides some of the best defense armor can supply. A suit of this armor comes with an undercoat of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.zBYEU9E7034ENCmh]{Padded Armor} and a pair of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Ix2vicchE79d6Cl3]{gauntlets}.

equipment-Greatsword.name: Greatsword
equipment-Greatsword.description: This immense two-handed sword is nearly as tall as its wielder. Its lower blade is often somewhat dulled to allow it to be gripped for extra leverage in close-quarter fights.

Gorumite Veteran.name: 古拉姆老兵 Gorumite Veteran
Gorumite Veteran.allSaves: 对抗恐惧效果时全豁免+2环境加值

Dragon Breath.name: 龙息 Dragon Breath
Dragon Breath.description:
圣牙有两种吐息方式。[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Dragon Breath]]{1d4轮}内他无法再使用龙息。

刀刃龙息 Blade Breath （奥术）他在@Template[line|distance:100]范围中吐出尖锐刀刃，造成@Damage[19d6[slashing]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:40|basic]豁免）。此吐息制造的刀刃在本轮结束时消失。

熔炉龙息 Forge Breath （奥术）他吐出一团余烬和烟雾，仿佛它们来自一个巨大熔炉。每个位于@Template[cone|distance:40]范围内的生物受到@Damage[6d6[fire]]伤害和@Damage[12d6[poison]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:40|basic]豁免）。烟雾会萦绕至圣牙下回合结束；所有烟雾内的生物获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]，烟雾外的所有生物也对烟雾内生物隐蔽。

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: 对抗魔法全豁免+1状态加值

Forge Vision.name: 熔炉视觉 Forge Vision
Forge Vision.description: 圣牙忽略烟和火造成的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]状态。

Spiked Scales.name: 尖刺鳞片 Spiked Scales
Spiked Scales.description: 一个近战打击圣牙大失败的生物受到@Damage[6d6[piercing]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:40|basic]豁免）。

Wing Deflection.name: 翼返 Wing Deflection
Wing Deflection.description:
触发 圣牙成为一次攻击的目标

效果 圣牙举起翅膀，它的AC针对触发攻击获得+2环境加值。若他正在飞行，攻击结束后他下降10尺。

Draconic Frenzy.name: 龙之狂怒 Draconic Frenzy
Draconic Frenzy.description: 圣牙以任意顺序进行两次爪抓打击和一次尾扫打击。

Draconic Momentum.name: 龙之威势 Draconic Momentum
Draconic Momentum.description: 当圣牙在一次打击中重击时，他立刻为龙息充能。

Saint Fang.name: 圣牙 Saint Fang
Saint Fang.publicNotes:
这条傲慢自大的龙常给人自以为是的印象。作为正义战争的化身，他认为自己不可能做错。他身上抛光的钢鳞会在移动时发出独特的刮擦声，宽阔的翅膀每次有力拍打时，针状的脊骨都会相互碰撞。圣牙是龙形的战争，一位才华横溢的战略大师。

最近越来越多的古拉姆信徒为了战斗而宣战。他们热衷于以任何借口制造流血，向古拉姆的神仆寻求帮助，但圣牙不响应这些召唤。他更可能出现在一群村民身边，他们整联合起来推翻当地的土匪大王，或者一群正在抵御殖民者的土著居民身边。他认为只要贪婪嗜血之人得到武器，战争就不可避免，而他会帮助那些因为没有和平的选项而发动战争的人。

圣牙很少会让人骑他，但他会服从钢铁雄主古拉姆的命令。神有时会命令圣牙带他的一名虔诚信徒参加战斗，而他会严格遵守命令，常常一到达战场就把他认为不配的骑兵打落下去。

圣牙的过去 Saint Fang's Past

许多格拉利昂的神学学者都在探寻圣牙的起源。最有可能（也被广泛相信）的解释是，他曾在格拉利昂上空翱翔，保护无辜的凡人免受战争蹂躏，但随着时间推移，疲惫不堪的他最终成了古拉姆手中完美的武器。

神仆 Servitor Of The Divine

所有神祇都有一群自己喜爱的代理人，负责在凡人间执行自己的意志。神使是其中最为人熟知的一种——独一无二的实体，担任神祇的代言人和信使，通常在凡人施法者以异界侍从仪式的形式请求帮助时被派遣。但神使并不是唯一被允许在信徒中行动或打击信仰之敌的存在。被称为神仆的存在同样独一无二、强大，是神祇最忠实的信徒之一。

神仆相当强大，但并非真正不朽。任何神仆都可能在战斗或意外中丧命。一些情况下，丧命神仆的躯体会消失，留下强大的宝物。另外一些情况，尸体会单纯地倒在地上。依据神祇的意愿，神仆可以被复活，但大部分时候神祇不会立刻施以复活，而可能只是去创造一个新的，或让完全不同的另一位仆从晋升。若是令人难以置信的事情发生——神祇本身灭亡——祂们现有的神仆不会死亡，但会立刻意识到他们的创造者已经死亡。一些神话讲述了神仆获取神力，取代创造者成为半神或真神的故事；在另一些神话中，绝望的神仆可能会寻找一位新神或女神来侍奉。

神仆的稀有度都是独特，大部分时候他们都曾是凡人信徒——可能是类人生物，也有其他——他们都大大取悦了神祇。赋予神仆的力量和能力千奇百怪，但几乎从未有过任何神祇的神仆低于15级，至少也会比他们生前要高上几级。一位神祇保有的神仆数量没有限制，但依据传统，大部分神最多保有三位。

在古拉姆这里，他最著名的三位神仆分别是恶魔、龙和元素生物，它们要么体现了战争的混乱，要么体现了原始的锻造精神。不管是哪种，这些独特神仆的世界观与哲学都与钢铁雄主非常相似，让它们被同类排挤甚至唾弃。然而对血手、圣牙合烈火淬炼来说，生命中没有比侍奉战神更令人欣慰的事了。
Saint Fang.allSaves: 对抗魔法全豁免+1状态加值

Battle Cry.name: Battle Cry
Battle Cry.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger Ordulf rolls initiative

Effect Ordulf attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} an observed foe.

Deadly Display.name: Deadly Display
Deadly Display.description:
Requirements Ordulf is wielding a melee weapon

Effect Ordulf brandishes his weapon in a threatening display. He @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralizes} all enemies within 30 feet, rolling once and comparing the result to each target's Will DC.

Whirlwind Strike.name: Whirlwind Strike
Whirlwind Strike.description: Ordulf Strikes each enemy within his reach. Each attack counts toward his multiple attack penalty, but do not increase his penalty until he has made all his attacks.

Battle Arrogance.name: Battle Arrogance
Battle Arrogance.description:
Ordulf hasn't met a significant combat challenge in ages, and even when facing deadly foes like the PCs his arrogance can be used against him. If a PC successfully @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarms}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feints}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightens}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trips} Ordulf, his arrogance gets the better of him and he grows sloppy in his tactics, reducing his AC to 34 until the start of his next turn. A PC can also attempt to issue a more debilitating insult to Ordulf.

Insult Ordulf 2

The PC spends several seconds issuing insults and taunts to Ordulf, then attempts a @Check[deception|dc:38], @Check[intimidation|dc:38], or @Check[performance|dc:38] check. If the insults include challenges to Ordulf's bravery, compare him to a troll or a chicken, insult his skill at fishing, or liken him to a witch or national of Irrisen, this becomes a DC 33 check.

Critical Success You strike a nerve. Not only does Ordulf become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} with anger, he is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1} from the shock of your words.

Success Your insults cause Ordulf to become sickened 2 with anger.

Failure Your insult only has a brief effect, causing Ordulf to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}. He automatically recovers from this sickened condition at the end of his next turn.

Critical Failure Your attempt to insult Ordulf fails so spectacularly that he becomes temporarily immune to Insult Ordulf activities from you for 24 hours.

Cleaving Blow.name: Cleaving Blow
Cleaving Blow.description: Ordulf Strikes two adjacent creatures within his reach. Both attacks count against his multiple attack penalty, but do not increase his penalty until he has made both attacks.

Crushing Insult.name: Crushing Insult
Crushing Insult.description:
Frequency once per round

Effect Ordulf issues a devastating and humiliating insult to a creature within 30 feet that he can see. Ordulf attempts an @Check[intimidation|defense:will] check against the target's Will DC. That character is then temporarily immune to Crushing Insult for 24 hours.

Critical Success The insult is distracting and humiliating; the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} for 1 minute.

Success The insult is distracting, but its effects pass quickly; the target is stupefied 1 and off-guard until the start of Ordulf's next turn.

Failure The insult barely cuts, but is distracting enough that the target is off-guard until the end of Ordulf's turn.

Critical Failure Ordulf's attempted insult fails spectacularly, and the PC who he was attempting to insult can instantly insult him back, using Insult Ordulf as a free action.

equipment-Greatsword.name: Greatsword
equipment-Greatsword.description: This immense two-handed sword is nearly as tall as its wielder. Its lower blade is often somewhat dulled to allow it to be gripped for extra leverage in close-quarter fights.

equipment-Full Plate.name: Full Plate
equipment-Full Plate.description: Plate mail consists of interlocking plates that encase nearly the entire body in a carapace of steel. It is costly and heavy, and the wearer often requires help to don it correctly, but it provides some of the best defense armor can supply. A suit of this armor comes with an undercoat of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.zBYEU9E7034ENCmh]{Padded Armor} and a pair of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Ix2vicchE79d6Cl3]{gauntlets}.

Fortification.description: 每当第一刃被重击，他尝试一次@Check[flat|dc:17]检定。成功时，重击变为普通命中。
Fortification.name: 护命 Fortification

Battle Sense.name: 战斗感知 Battle Sense
Battle Sense.description: 60尺内，第一刃可以感知到金属武器和金属重甲，这是一种精准感官。

Halo of Blades.name: 刃之光环 Halo of Blades

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: 对抗魔法时全豁免+1状态加值

Disarm Vulnerability.name: 卸武弱点 Disarm Vulnerability
Disarm Vulnerability.description: 若第一刃被卸武，他受到@Damage[8d6[mental]]伤害（@Check[will|dc:36|basic]豁免，大失败时陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}）。且他无法在1轮内召唤武器。

Conjure Weapon.name: 召唤武器 Conjure Weapon
Conjure Weapon.description:
需求 第一刃有一只空手

频率 每轮一次

效果 第一刃张开手臂握拳；当他这样做时，一把常见的+2高等强击高等星魂近战武器出现在他手中，材质为寒铁或银。如果他放开召唤的武器，或它被卸武，武器立刻消失。如果他投掷召唤的武器，它在被投掷后、可能对目标造成伤害后消失。第一刃偏好使用巨剑进行近战打击，用轻锤进行投掷远程打击，但他无法同时拥有一件以上的召唤武器。

Lord of Battle.name: 战争之主 Lord of Battle
Lord of Battle.description: 第一刃熟练使用所有近战和投掷武器，他能使用所有此类武器的重击专精效果。他用所有近战武器进行的近战打击造成额外1d6持续流血伤害。

Whirling Blades.name: 旋转刀刃 Whirling Blades
Whirling Blades.description:
频率 每分钟一次

效果 在微弱的凶猛战角声中，第一刃变成一团大型旋转金属刀片，然后行走两次。这种移动不会触发反应，他可以穿过被占据的空间，但他必须在一个未被占据的空间结束移动，移动结束时他恢复真正的形态。在第一刃的行走过程中至少被他穿过一次的所有生物受到@Damage[10d10[slashing]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:36|basic]豁免）。

Blessed Boundary.name: Blessed Boundary
Blessed Boundary.description:
Manifestations of divine force appear in the hundreds, swirling in a massive, protective sphere. These typically look like spiky fragments, but often take on an appearance themed to the deity of the caster. The sphere is hollow, with the manifestations forming a shell 2 inches deep on the outer edge. You can choose to make the burst smaller, in 5-foot increments, when you cast it. The shell provides cover and can intersect solid terrain without affecting it. The shell deals 7d8 force damage to each creature who intersects with the shell when the sphere's created, or who attempts to move through the shell. The creature also takes the damage at the end of its turn, but only if it didn't already take damage from the shell that turn. The effects are determined by a creature's Reflex save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage, is pushed up to 10 feet in the direction of your choice, and ends its movement.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage, is pushed up to 20 feet in the direction of your choice, and ends its movement.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d8.

Fly (Constant).name: Fly (Constant)
Fly (Constant).description:
The target can soar through the air, gaining a fly Speed equal to its Speed or 20 feet, whichever is greater.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.MuRBCiZn5IKeaoxi]{Spell Effect: Fly}

Heightened (7th) The duration increases to 1 hour.

Translocate.name: Translocate
Translocate.description:
You instantly transport yourself and any items you're wearing and holding from your current space to an unoccupied space within range you can see. If this would bring another creature with you—even if you're carrying it in an extradimensional container—the spell is lost.

Heightened (5th) The range increases to 1 mile. You don't need to be able to see your destination, as long as you have been there in the past and know its relative location and distance from you. You are then temporarily immune for 1 hour.

Weapon Storm.name: Weapon Storm
Weapon Storm.description:
Area 30-foot cone or 10-foot emanation

You swing a weapon you're holding, and the weapon magically multiplies into duplicates that swipe at all creatures in either a cone or an emanation. This flurry deals four dice of damage to creatures in the area. This damage has the same type as the weapon and uses the same die size. Determine the die size as if you were attacking with the weapon; for instance, if you were wielding a two-hand weapon in both hands, you'd use its two-hand damage die.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The target takes half damage.

Failure The target takes full damage.

Critical Failure The target takes double damage and is subject to the weapon's critical specialization effect.

Heightened (+1) Add another damage die.

The First Blade.name: 第一刃 The First Blade
The First Blade.publicNotes:
古拉姆的神使第一刃据说是数万年前，由古拉姆剑上裂开的一片毫无思想的钢片形成的。它是活生生的战争工具，随着战争面貌演变，第一刃已被古拉姆无数次重塑。第一刃不属于任何特定族裔；它是主人的镜子，盔甲和武器就是他的身体——内里存在的只有空虚。和古拉姆一样，第一刃自认是男性。

神使 Heralds

神使是神灵的代表。大多神祇都拥有一名神使，其任务是充当神或女神在凡人之间的信使和代理人。拥有神使特征的生物永远具有独特稀有度，通常为15级（有时也存在例外）。当神使被杀，与它们关联的神祇可能会将其复活、用一个新生物取而代之，或者极少数情况下过一段没有神使的日子。
The First Blade.allSaves: 对抗魔法时全豁免+1状态加值

Fire Crossbows!.name: 发射弩箭！ Fire Crossbows!
Fire Crossbows!.description:
古拉姆步兵团给手中的弩装填并上弦，然后以齐射的方式进行一次远程攻击。

这次齐射射程为120尺，对@Template[burst|distance:10]范围造成@Damage[6d8[piercing]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:31|basic]豁免）。如果部队规模缩减到8格或更小，爆发范围减少到@Template[burst|distance:5]。

Raise Swords!.name: 放平长剑！ Raise Swords!
Raise Swords!.description:
频率 每轮一次

效果 古拉姆步兵团对10尺内的每个敌人进行一次狂暴攻势，@Check[reflex|dc:31|basic]豁免。伤害取决于消耗的动作数。

1 @Damage[(1d12+4)[slashing]]伤害。

2 @Damage[(2d12+10)[slashing]]伤害和@Damage[1d6[persistent,bleed]]伤害。

3 @Damage[(3d12+10)[slashing]]伤害和@Damage[2d6[persistent,bleed]]伤害。

Troop Movement.name: 部队移动 Troop Movement
Troop Movement.description:
当部队行走时，他们首先用自由动作@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.OvqohW9YuahnFaiX]，收缩为一个20 x 20的方阵（减去任何因丧失生命值减少的方格），然后移动最多等于速度的距离。

这相当于巨型生物移动：举例来说，如果部队的任何一部分进入困难地形，额外的移动力消耗都对整个部队有效。

Gorumite Infantry.name: 古拉姆步兵团 Gorumite Infantry
Gorumite Infantry.publicNotes:
格拉利昂的大多数城镇都有专业的警卫部队，他们的职责包括巡逻街道，协助有需要的公民，以及在危机时刻做出快速军事反应。卫兵通常成组或以分队行动，但当严重的紧急情况威胁到他们时，卫兵会在最近的要塞、哨站或其他集结点集合，然后去搜寻他们的目标。或者，守卫部队可能会驻扎在城市的重要地点，如城门、监狱、或统治者城堡的入口。

单独的守卫可能不是特别训练有素或经验丰富的士兵，但如果数量庞大，他们就能打败强盗、溜进城门的野生动物，或者偶尔出现的喝醉的食人魔。一组城市守卫通常由一个队长现场指挥，队长负责大部分的交涉场合，并给每个守卫下达命令。该城市警卫分队的成员们一起训练，会执行简单的战术，但不会执行高级军事战术。

Sense Blood.description: 血雾能够感知到120尺内有血液的生物。它能感知到1英里内暴露的血液。
Sense Blood.name: 血液感知 Sense Blood

Blood Siphon.name: 鲜血虹吸 Blood Siphon
Blood Siphon.description:
当血雾用迷雾触须打击对一个生物造成伤害时，生物必须尝试一次@Check[fortitude|dc:38]豁免。若打击为重击，生物的豁免结果视为低一级。血雾从鲜血虹吸中获得的临时生命值在1小时后消失。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 该生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}。

失败 该生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}，且血雾获得20点临时生命值。

大失败 该生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2}。血雾获得40点临时生命值，其身体呈现一种深红色泽，直到其下回合结束。在此期间，血雾的AC和豁免获得+2状态加值，并且获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]状态。它只能用此额外动作进行打击。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.ceOkHxhJNTcvZkCy]{效果：鲜血虹吸 (大失败)}

Blood Vengeance.name: 鲜血复仇 Blood Vengeance
Blood Vengeance.description: 虽然它无法真正流血，血雾也可以施展溢血深仇。除了法术通常的触发条件，血雾可以在目标的穿刺、挥砍或持续流血未对血雾本身造成实际伤害的情况下（不管是因为被抗力抵消或是因免疫流血）用反应动作施放溢血深仇。

Misty Form.name: 迷雾形态 Misty Form
Misty Form.description: 血雾的躯体由半固体的虹色雾气组成，它的浓稠度和厚泡沫类似。这使血雾能移动穿过1寸宽的狭窄空间而无需减速。然而，血雾无法持握物品或与物品交互。它也无法进入水或其他流体中，当被风影响时它被视为超小型。

Vampiric Feast.name: Vampiric Feast
Vampiric Feast.description:
Your touch leeches the lifeblood out of a target to empower yourself. You deal 6d6 void damage to the target. You gain temporary Hit Points equal to half the void damage the target takes (after applying resistances and the like). You lose any remaining temporary Hit Points after 1 minute.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

Blood Vendetta (At Will).name: Blood Vendetta (At Will)
Blood Vendetta (At Will).description:
Requirements You can bleed.

Trigger A creature deals piercing, slashing, or persistent bleed damage to you.

You curse the target, punishing it for having the audacity to spill your blood. The target takes 2d6 persistent bleed damage and must attempt a Will save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes half the persistent bleed damage.

Failure The target takes the full persistent bleed damage. Until the bleeding stops, the target has weakness 1 to piercing and slashing damage. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.buXx8Azr4BYWPtFg]{Spell Effect: Blood Vendetta (Failure)}

Critical Failure As failure, but the target takes double the persistent bleed damage.

Heightened (+2) The persistent bleed damage increases by 2d6.

Vampiric Exsanguination.name: Vampiric Exsanguination
Vampiric Exsanguination.description:
You draw in the blood and life force of other creatures through your outstretched arms. You deal 12d6 void damage to living creatures in the area with a basic Fortitude save.

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to half the damage a single creature takes from this spell; calculate these temporary Hit Points using the creature that took the most damage. You lose any remaining temporary Hit Points after 1 minute.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

Bloodfog.name: 血雾 Bloodfog
Bloodfog.publicNotes:
血雾是一种由饥饿的猩红雾气构成的巨大生物。它看起来拥有模糊的人形面孔——但通常也就比都是洞的头盖骨好一点——这面孔不断在雾化的身体中形成、消散。它们红宝石般的卷须触手要坚固得多，可以从身体中滑出，造成很深的切割伤。

血雾喜欢在人口密集的地区，或者发生过大规模暴力事件的地点附近狩猎，它们会漂进来吃东西，再飘走。它们穿过生机勃勃的村子，留下的只有寂静和干尸。人们认为血雾是在它们最常出现的地方产生：军队造成过大规模流血和死亡的杀戮地点。

空无之死的血 Blood Of The Empty Death

人们认为血雾的初次形成要归功于邪恶女神宁布洛斯的影响。虚空之蕨，宁布洛斯早已消亡的故乡，据说那里的整座岛屿甚至次大陆都被巨大的血雾笼罩着。一些人声称较小的血雾不过是“觅食的触角”，它们通过虚空之蕨的单向传送门伸向其他物质位面。

Faith Bound.name: 信仰所缚 Faith Bound
Faith Bound.description: 银剑士无法攻击公开佩戴或展示阿卡艾克克圣徽的生物，除非该生物先对银剑士采取敌对行动。它可以攻击一个它认为对阿卡艾克克信仰不忠诚的、或仅为计谋佩戴圣徽的生物（通常需要先成功进行一次察觉检定来@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1xRFPTFtWtGJ9ELw]）。

Reflect Truths.name: 真实映照 Reflect Truths
Reflect Truths.description: 20尺。一个进入范围的生物必须成功通过一次@Check[will|dc:37]豁免，否则它会在银剑士反光的脸上看到自己的脸正注视自己。1分钟内，该生物不能说出任何有意或故意的谎言，且在欺骗坚定中承受-2状态减值。大失败时，该状态减值增加为-4。

Liquefy.name: 液化 Liquefy
Liquefy.description: 银剑士完全液化成为无定型形态。它获得对精准伤害的免疫，但受到双倍寒冷伤害。液化时，它仅能使用移动动作和尖刺远程打击。它可以再次使用此动作来恢复正常形态。

Mirror.name: 镜子 Mirror
Mirror.description: 直到它下次行动，银剑士看起来仿佛一面镜子。它在伪装镜子的欺骗检定和DC上自动取53的结果。

Silver Strikes.name: 银之打击 Silver Strikes
Silver Strikes.description: 银剑士的腿击和尖刺打击视为银质武器。

Swift Steps.name: 迅捷脚步 Swift Steps
Swift Steps.description: 银剑士永久@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]，它只能用此额外动作来快步或行走。

Evasion.name: 反射闪避 Evasion
Evasion.description: 当银剑士在反射豁免中骰出成功，它转而获得大成功。

Focus Gaze.name: 聚焦凝视 Focus Gaze
Focus Gaze.description: 银剑士将视线凝聚到一个30尺内它能看到的生物上。目标必须立刻尝试一次对抗真实映照的意志豁免。若生物已经被真实映照影响，它@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}。尝试豁免后，该生物对聚焦凝视临时免疫，直到银剑士下回合开始时。

Silver Saber.name: 银剑士 Silver Saber
Silver Saber.publicNotes:
数百年前，红螳螂秘术师制造了这具构装体，在刺客教团逃离拉哈多姆后不久，阿卡艾克克的牧师就为其灌输了智慧，让其作为神圣守卫工作。银剑士的唯一目的是保卫鲜血女士的秘密不被无资格之人知晓。

银剑士静止不动看起来就像一面华丽的镜子，但当它进入战斗时，它会活化成一只螳螂，身躯由几乎呈液态的抛光银组成，人形的面孔一片空白。

作为镜子 Life as a Mirror

银剑士几个世纪以来一直看着阿卡艾克克的信徒，它静静坐在金色镜框中假装自己是面镜子。它相当了解红螳螂的秘密生活，比萨扎里记载得还详细，但它的目的不是记录历史，而是充当守卫——不多，也不少。

The Promised One.name: The Promised One
The Promised One.publicNotes:
This undead guardian stands amid a whirling swarm of shackled spirits that rage against their fate. Bound by a profane necromantic ritual, a nemhaith and its servitors maintain watch over an object or place so important they embraced undeath to guard it. This ritual binds connected beings-friends, family, fellow worshippers, or even sacrificed innocents-to form a single nemhaith.

Most nemhaiths were, in life, priests or protectors who sought immortality to protect the temple they served or guard an important landmark. Others follow an endless and even impossible quest beyond the bounds of life and death. A nemhaith is not always evil at first, but the inherent evil and violence of a nemhaith's existence inevitably darkens even the brightest light.

Site Bound.name: Site Bound
Site Bound.description:
The nemhaith is bound to a place or large stationary object and can't venture more than 500 feet from this focus.

A typical ghost can stray only a short distance from where it was killed or the place it haunts. A typical limit is 120 feet. Some ghosts are instead bound to a room, building, item, or creature that was special to it rather than a location.

Rejuvenation.name: Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description:
Destroying the ritual object or place used in the nemhaith's creation destroys the nemhaith, freeing its bound spirits to move on to the afterlife.

When a ghost is destroyed, it re-forms after [[/br 2d4 #days]]{2d4 days} within the location it's bound to, fully healed. A ghost can be permanently destroyed only if someone determines the reason for its existence and sets right whatever prevents the spirit from resting.

Drain Life.name: Drain Life
Drain Life.description:
When the nemhaith damages a living creature with its spirit tendril Strike, the creature must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:36] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2}.

Further damage dealt by the nemhaith increases the condition value by 1 on a failed save, to a maximum of drained 4.

Rage of Spirits.name: Rage of Spirits
Rage of Spirits.description: The nemhaith's bound spirits rage and smash everything in a @Template[emanation|distance:30]. Creatures in this area take @Damage[4d6[sonic],4d6[void]]{4d6 sonic damage and 4d6 void damage} (@Check[fortitude|dc:36|basic] save).

Throw Spirits.name: Throw Spirits
Throw Spirits.description:
The nemhaith directs its bound spirits as a group to move up to 1 mile away (they have a fly Speed of 60 feet). The nemhaith can see and hear through the thrown spirits, but it loses its aura and can't use its spirit dart ranged Strike or Rage of Spirits.

The nemhaith regains these abilities when the spirits return to the nemhaith's space.

Execute.name: Execute
Execute.description:
You point at a creature and invoke the demise of all things. The target takes 70 void damage with a basic Fortitude save. If the target is undead or otherwise has void healing, the spell loses the death and void traits and gains the vitality trait, and the target takes 70 vitality damage with a basic Fortitude save.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 10.

Wall of Force.name: Wall of Force
Wall of Force.description:
You form an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} wall of pure magical force up to 50 feet long and up to 20 feet high. The wall has no discernible thickness. You must create the wall in an unbroken open space so its edges don't pass through any creatures or objects, or the spell is lost. The wall has AC 10, Hardness 30, and 60 Hit Points, and it's immune to critical hits and precision damage. The wall blocks physical effects from passing through it, and because it's made of force, it blocks incorporeal and ethereal creatures as well. Teleportation effects can pass through the barrier, as can visual effects (since the wall is invisible). Wall of force is immune to counteracting effects of its level or lower, but the wall is automatically destroyed by a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.r7ihOgKv19eJQnik]{Disintegrate} spell of any rank.

Heightened (+2) The Hit Points of the wall increases by 20.

Harm.name: Harm
Harm.description:
You channel void energy to harm the living or heal the undead. If the target is a living creature, you deal 1d8 void damage to it, and it gets a basic Fortitude save. If the target is a willing undead creature, you restore that amount of Hit Points. The number of actions you spend when Casting this Spell determines its targets, range, area, and other parameters.

1 The spell has a range of touch.

2 (concentrate) The spell has a range of 30 feet. If you're healing an undead creature, increase the Hit Points restored by 8.

3 (concentrate) You disperse void energy in a @Template[emanation|distance:30]. This targets all living and undead creatures in the area.

Heightened (+1) The amount of healing or damage increases by 1d8, and the extra healing for the 2-action version increases by 8.

Temperbrand.name: 烈火淬炼 Temperbrand
Temperbrand.publicNotes:
烈火淬炼是一个14尺高的元素生物，外表令人联想到矮人，但她看起来完全是由橙白相间的淬热金属构成的。刀片在她的皮肤上形成、折叠，随着她的移动和战斗又不断弯折，但替代她手臂的长剑始终保持一个模样。她的战斗散发着凶猛的热情，她切开敌人，要么用四肢化成的炽热刀片，要么她喷发出蒸汽和高热空气，用体内弹出的金属片切割肉体。

烈火淬炼是古拉姆创造的现代武器化身，也代表着熔炉那锻造任何战争工具的能力。她来自锻造之心，一个强大的火元素和炉渣吞噬者（Slageater）融合形成了她。古拉姆让这两个元素生物并肩作战300余年，然后将它们融合成一个存在。

烈火淬炼经常被派去支援那些实力悬殊的士兵，试图增加战场上取胜的几率，让战争在古拉姆眼中更为壮观。她可能会出现在军需官面前，用自己的身体为他们提供所需的刀刃、盾牌和护甲。

烈火淬炼的尸体 Temperbrand's Corpse

这位强大的元素生物尚未死去过，但倘若烈火淬炼被杀，她的尸体会迅速坍塌，变为一把强大的魔法大锤。@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.596xrLHt1Sx0p7Pm]

神仆 Servitor Of The Divine

所有神祇都有一群自己喜爱的代理人，负责在凡人间执行自己的意志。神使是其中最为人熟知的一种——独一无二的实体，担任神祇的代言人和信使，通常在凡人施法者以异界侍从仪式的形式请求帮助时被派遣。但神使并不是唯一被允许在信徒中行动或打击信仰之敌的存在。被称为神仆的存在同样独一无二、强大，是神祇最忠实的信徒之一。

神仆相当强大，但并非真正不朽。任何神仆都可能在战斗或意外中丧命。一些情况下，丧命神仆的躯体会消失，留下强大的宝物。另外一些情况，尸体会单纯地倒在地上。依据神祇的意愿，神仆可以被复活，但大部分时候神祇不会立刻施以复活，而可能只是去创造一个新的，或让完全不同的另一位仆从晋升。若是令人难以置信的事情发生——神祇本身灭亡——祂们现有的神仆不会死亡，但会立刻意识到他们的创造者已经死亡。一些神话讲述了神仆获取神力，取代创造者成为半神或真神的故事；在另一些神话中，绝望的神仆可能会寻找一位新神或女神来侍奉。

神仆的稀有度都是独特，大部分时候他们都曾是凡人信徒——可能是类人生物，也有其他——他们都大大取悦了神祇。赋予神仆的力量和能力千奇百怪，但几乎从未有过任何神祇的神仆低于15级，至少也会比他们生前要高上几级。一位神祇保有的神仆数量没有限制，但依据传统，大部分神最多保有三位。

在古拉姆这里，他最著名的三位神仆分别是恶魔、龙和元素生物，它们要么体现了战争的混乱，要么体现了原始的锻造精神。不管是哪种，这些独特神仆的世界观与哲学都与钢铁雄主非常相似，让它们被同类排挤甚至唾弃。然而对血手、圣牙合烈火淬炼来说，生命中没有比侍奉战神更令人欣慰的事了。

Molten Spray.name: 熔融喷涂 Molten Spray
Molten Spray.description:
触发 烈火淬炼受到物理伤害

效果 烈火淬炼的受伤部位向一个她自选的空间喷发出熔炼的铁水。任何占据该空间的生物受到@Damage[9d6[fire]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:37|basic]豁免）。

Vulnerable to Water.name: 为水所克 Vulnerable to Water
Vulnerable to Water.description: 当烈火淬炼被一个水效果视为目标时，她受到@Damage[6d6[cold]]伤害，并且因她的身体硬化为固体金属而陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}，持续[[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}。只要她还在缓慢状态，她的AC增加到43。

Hurl Slagblade.name: 猛掷炉渣刃 Hurl Slagblade
Hurl Slagblade.description:
烈火淬炼挥起手臂，鞭打120尺内的一个目标，让她的炉渣刃脱离身体飞出去。目标生物必须尝试一次@Check[reflex|dc:40|options:damaging-effect]豁免。烈火淬炼身上会立刻再生一把新的炉渣刃，但她[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Hurl Slag]]{1d4轮}内无法再使用猛掷炉渣刃。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 该生物受到@Damage[5d10[fire]]伤害。

失败 该生物受到@Damage[10d10[fire]]伤害，且硬化的炉渣让生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}，持续3轮。一个生物可以通过逃脱（DC 40）限制身体的炉渣块来结束缓慢状态。

大失败 该生物受到@Damage[20d10[fire]]伤害，且炉渣迅速将它钉在原地，让生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]状态，直到@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]（DC 40）。

Ooze Form.name: 泥怪形态 Ooze Form
Ooze Form.description: 烈火淬炼的身体变成不定形形态。她的AC变成30，且她免疫重击和精准伤害。在此形态下她陷入目盲（但保留震颤感知），且她的速度降至15尺（最低为5尺）。她能如超小型生物一样穿过空间而不受到惩罚。只要她仍保持着泥怪形态，她就无法进行炉渣刃打击或使用猛掷炉渣刃，但她获得践踏能力。她可以通过再次使用这个行动来结束泥怪形态。

Slagblade Storm.name: 炉渣刃风暴 Slagblade Storm
Slagblade Storm.description: 烈火淬炼对所有触及内生物进行一次炉渣刃打击。她的多重攻击减值在该行动结束前不增加。

Trample (Ooze Form Only).name: 践踏 Trample (仅限泥怪形态)

Commanding Shout.name: 指挥之吼 Commanding Shout
Commanding Shout.description:
只要古拉姆步兵团在听觉范围内，沃夫纳就可以指挥步兵团为古拉姆的荣耀战斗。直到沃夫纳下回合开始，古拉姆步兵团的发射弩箭！及放平长剑！的DC增加到33，且他们的豁免检定获得+2状态加值。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.F1JHRa75KBAjHOs1]{效果: 指挥之吼}

Consecrated.name: 受加护 Consecrated
Consecrated.description: 只要皇冠屯内的加护术仪式效果仍存在，古拉姆战斗祭司的攻击、技能、豁免和察觉检定就获得+1状态加值；这些加值并未算入数据栏。

Fervent Casting.name: 狂热施法 Fervent Casting
Fervent Casting.description:
频率 每天一次

效果 古拉姆战斗祭司大声宣扬古拉姆的荣耀。TA施放的下一个神术法术的动作减少一个（最少减到一个），但只能以战斗祭司本人为目标。若该法术影响一个区域或多个目标，比如祝福术，它只影响战斗祭司本人，即使它的持续时间多于一轮。

Blessed Boundary.name: Blessed Boundary
Blessed Boundary.description:
Manifestations of divine force appear in the hundreds, swirling in a massive, protective sphere. These typically look like spiky fragments, but often take on an appearance themed to the deity of the caster. The sphere is hollow, with the manifestations forming a shell 2 inches deep on the outer edge. You can choose to make the burst smaller, in 5-foot increments, when you cast it. The shell provides cover and can intersect solid terrain without affecting it. The shell deals 7d8 force damage to each creature who intersects with the shell when the sphere's created, or who attempts to move through the shell. The creature also takes the damage at the end of its turn, but only if it didn't already take damage from the shell that turn. The effects are determined by a creature's Reflex save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage, is pushed up to 10 feet in the direction of your choice, and ends its movement.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage, is pushed up to 20 feet in the direction of your choice, and ends its movement.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d8.

Breath of Life.name: Breath of Life
Breath of Life.description:
Trigger A living creature within range would die.

Your blessing revives a creature at the moment of its death. You prevent the target from dying and restore 5d8 Hit Points to the target. You can't use breath of life if the triggering effect was a death effect or an effect that leaves no remains, such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.r7ihOgKv19eJQnik]{Disintegrate}

Heightened (+2) The healing increases by 1d8.

Divine Wrath.name: Divine Wrath
Divine Wrath.description:
You channel the fury of divinity against your foes. You deal 4d10 spirit damage to enemies in the area, depending on their Fortitude save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}.

Critical Failure The creature takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2}; while it's sickened, it's also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1}.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d10.

Enduring Might.name: Enduring Might
Enduring Might.description:
Trigger An attack or effect would deal damage to you.

Your own might mingles with divine power to protect you from harm. You gain resistance equal to 8 plus your Strength modifier against all damage from the triggering attack or effect.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.ZHVtJKnur9PAF5TO]{Spell Effect: Enduring Might}

Heightened (+1) The resistance increases by 2.

Fly.name: Fly
Fly.description:
The target can soar through the air, gaining a fly Speed equal to its Speed or 20 feet, whichever is greater.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.MuRBCiZn5IKeaoxi]{Spell Effect: Fly}

Heightened (7th) The duration increases to 1 hour.

Unfettered Movement.name: Unfettered Movement
Unfettered Movement.description: You repel effects that would hinder a creature or slow its movement. While under this spell's effect, the target ignores effects that would give them a circumstance penalty to Speed. When they attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} an effect that has them @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained}, they automatically succeed unless the effect is magical and of a higher rank than the unfettered movement spell.

Blindness.name: Blindness
Blindness.description:
You blind the target. The effect is determined by the target's Fortitude save. The target then becomes temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} until its next turn begins.

Failure The target is Blinded for 1 minute.

Critical Failure The target is Blinded permanently.

Heroism.description:
You unlock the target's inner heroism, granting it a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, Perception checks, saving throws, and skill checks.

Heightened (6th) The status bonus increases to +2.

Heightened (9th) The status bonus increases to +3.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.l9HRQggofFGIxEse]{Spell Effect: Heroism}
Heroism.name: Heroism

Clear Mind.name: Clear Mind
Clear Mind.description:
You drive mental contamination from the target's mind. Attempt to counteract an effect of your choice imposing one of these conditions on the target: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied}. If you failed to counteract the effect but you would have if its counteract rank were 2 lower, instead suppress the effect until the beginning of your next turn. The effect's duration doesn't elapse while it's suppressed. This spell can't counteract or suppress conditions that are part of curses, diseases, or a natural state of the target.

Heightened (4th) Add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{Controlled}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed} to the list of conditions.

Heightened (6th) Add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed} to the list of conditions.

Heightened (8th) Add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned} to the list of conditions.

Dispel Magic.name: Dispel Magic
Dispel Magic.description: You unravel the magic behind a spell or effect. Attempt a counteract check against the target. If you successfully counteract a magic item, the item becomes a mundane item of its type for 10 minutes. This doesn't change the item's non-magical properties. If the target is an artifact or similar item, you automatically fail.

Noise Blast.name: Noise Blast
Noise Blast.description:
A cacophonous noise blasts out, dealing 2d10 sonic damage. Each creature must attempt a Fortitude save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened} for 1 round.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage, is deafened for 1 minute, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d10.

See the Unseen.name: See the Unseen
See the Unseen.description:
Your gaze pierces through illusions and finds @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} creatures and spirits. You can see invisible creatures as though they weren't invisible, although their features are blurred, making them @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} and difficult to identify. You can also see incorporeal creatures, like ghosts, phased through an object from within 10 feet of an object's surface as blurry shapes seen through those objects. Subtler clues also grant you a +2 status bonus to checks you make to disbelieve illusions.

Heightened (5th) This spell has a duration of 8 hours.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.T5bk6UH7yuYog1Fp]{Spell Effect: See the Unseen}

Share Life.name: Share Life
Share Life.description: You forge a temporary link between the target's life essence and your own. The target takes half damage from all effects that deal Hit Point damage, and you take the remainder of the damage. When you take damage through this link, you don't apply any resistances, weaknesses, or other abilities you have to that damage; you simply take that amount of damage. The spell ends if the target is ever more than 30 feet away from you. If either you or the target is reduced to 0 Hit Points, any damage from this spell is resolved and then the spell ends.

Bless.name: Bless
Bless.description:
Blessings from beyond help your companions strike true. You and your allies gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls while within the emanation. Once per round on subsequent turns, you can Sustain the spell to increase the emanation's radius by 10 feet.

Bless can counteract @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.7ZinJNzxq0XF0oMx]{Bane}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.RfCEHpMoEAZvB9IZ]{Aura: Bless}

Daze.name: Daze
Daze.description:
You push into the target's mind and daze it with a mental jolt. The jolt deals 1d6 mental damage, with a basic Will save. If the target critically fails the save, it is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Heightened (+2) The damage increases by 1d6.

Heal.name: Heal
Heal.description:
You channel vital energy to heal the living or damage the undead. If the target is a willing living creature, you restore 1d8 Hit Points. If the target is undead, you deal that amount of vitality damage to it, and it gets a basic Fortitude save. The number of actions you spend when Casting this Spell determines its targets, range, area, and other parameters.

1 The spell has a range of touch.

2 (concentrate) The spell has a range of 30 feet. If you're healing a living creature, increase the Hit Points restored by 8.

3 (concentrate) You disperse vital energy in a @Template[emanation|distance:30]. This targets all living and undead creatures in the burst.

Heightened (+1) The amount of healing or damage increases by 1d8, and the extra healing for the 2-action version increases by 8.

Mending.name: Mending
Mending.description:
You repair the target item. You restore 5 Hit Points per spell rank to the target, potentially removing the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6dNUvdb1dhToNDj3]{Broken} condition if this repairs it past the item's Broken Threshold. You can't replace lost pieces or repair an object that's been completely destroyed.

Heightened (2nd) You can target a non-magical object of 1 Bulk or less.

Heightened (3rd) You can target a non-magical object of 2 Bulk or less, or a magical object of 1 Bulk or less.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description:
You raise a magical shield of force. This counts as using the Raise a Shield action, giving you a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn, but it doesn't require a hand to use.

While the spell is in effect, you can use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block} reaction with your magic shield. The shield has Hardness 5. You can use the spell's reaction to reduce damage from any spell or magical effect, even if it doesn't deal physical damage. After you use Shield Block, the spell ends and you can't cast it again for 10 minutes.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Jemq5UknGdMO7b73]{Spell Effect: Shield}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.QF6RDlCoTvkVHRo4]{Effect: Shield Immunity}

Heightened (+2) The shield's Hardness increases by 5.

Stabilize.name: Stabilize
Stabilize.description: Life energy shuts death's door. The target loses the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying} condition, though it remains @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} at 0 Hit Points.

equipment-Greatsword.name: Greatsword
equipment-Greatsword.description: This immense two-handed sword is nearly as tall as its wielder. Its lower blade is often somewhat dulled to allow it to be gripped for extra leverage in close-quarter fights.

equipment-Breastplate.name: Breastplate
equipment-Breastplate.description: Though referred to as a breastplate, this type of armor consists of several pieces of plate or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.pRoikbRo5HFW6YUB]{Half Plate} armor that protect the torso, chest, neck, and sometimes the hips and lower legs. It strategically grants some of the protection of plate while allowing greater flexibility and speed.

equipment-Iron Religious Symbol of Gorum.name: Iron Religious Symbol of Gorum
equipment-Iron Religious Symbol of Gorum.description: This piece of wood or silver is emblazoned with an image representing a deity. Some divine spellcasters, such as clerics, can use a religious symbol of their deity to use certain abilities and cast some spells. A religious symbol can be worn on the body on a chain or pin, or can be held.

Cleanse Affliction.name: Cleanse Affliction
Cleanse Affliction.description:
Gentle restorative magic pushes back the effects of toxins and more complex maladies. Choose an affliction on the target, such as a curse, disease, or poison. If it has advanced past stage one, reduce the stage by one. This reduction can be applied only once to a given case of an affliction, with the case ending when it's completely cured. Although the reduction can't occur again, heightened versions of this spell attempt to counteract with each casting.

Heightened (3rd) Attempt to counteract the affliction if it is a disease or poison.

Heightened (4th) Attempt to counteract the affliction if it is a curse, disease, or poison.

Athletic Rush.name: Athletic Rush
Athletic Rush.description:
Your body fills with physical power and skill. You gain a +10-foot status bonus to Speed and a +2 status bonus to Athletics checks. As a part of Casting this Spell, you can use a Stride, Leap, Climb, or Swim action. The spell's bonuses apply during that action.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.57lnrCzGUcNUBP2O]{Spell Effect: Athletic Rush}

Enfeeble.name: Enfeeble
Enfeeble.description:
You sap the target's strength, depending on its Fortitude save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} until the start of your next turn.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} for 1 minute.

Critical Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 3} for 1 minute.

Forbidding Ward.name: Forbidding Ward
Forbidding Ward.description:
You ward an ally against the attacks and hostile spells from the target enemy. The target ally gains a +1 status bonus to Armor Class and saving throws against the target enemy's attacks, spells, and other effects.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.ctMxYPGEpstvhW9C]{Spell Effect: Forbidding Ward}

Heightened (6th) The status bonus increases to +2.

Guidance.name: Guidance
Guidance.description:
You ask for the guidance of supernatural entities, granting the target a +1 status bonus to one attack roll, Perception check, saving throw, or skill check the target attempts before the duration ends. The target chooses which roll to use the bonus on before rolling. If the target uses the bonus, the spell ends. Either way, the target is then temporarily immune for 1 hour.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.3qHKBDF7lrHw8jFK]{Spell Effect: Guidance}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.3LyOkV25p7wA181H]{Effect: Guidance Immunity}

Harm.name: Harm
Harm.description:
You channel void energy to harm the living or heal the undead. If the target is a living creature, you deal 1d8 void damage to it, and it gets a basic Fortitude save. If the target is a willing undead creature, you restore that amount of Hit Points. The number of actions you spend when Casting this Spell determines its targets, range, area, and other parameters.

1 The spell has a range of touch.

2 (concentrate) The spell has a range of 30 feet. If you're healing an undead creature, increase the Hit Points restored by 8.

3 (concentrate) You disperse void energy in a @Template[emanation|distance:30]. This targets all living and undead creatures in the area.

Heightened (+1) The amount of healing or damage increases by 1d8, and the extra healing for the 2-action version increases by 8.

equipment-Blood Sight Elixir (Greater).name: Blood Sight Elixir (Greater)
equipment-Blood Sight Elixir (Greater).description:
Activate 1 (manipulate)

This thick, blood-red elixir sharpens your senses and makes you more acutely aware of blood. You gain blood sight as a precise sense with a duration of 1 hour. Blood sight has a range of 60 feet and allows you to detect living creatures who are taking persistent bleed damage or who have the dying or wounded conditions. You also detect free-standing puddles or droplets of recently spilled blood. At the GM's discretion, living creatures without blood can't be detected with your blood sight.

Infused Items.name: Infused Items
Infused Items.description:
Shirota carries the following infused items, which last for 24 hours or until the next time he makes his daily preparations:

12 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.n5yTlTs63o53n3k6]{Alchemist's Fire (Greater)}

3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.PWh9oBvwMmItEmHH]{Blood Sight Elixir (Greater)}

12 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.kpJmjm843vaMZjIu]{Dread Ampoule (Greater)}

10 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.AmxSqEoFhRLMYd1W]{Elixir of Life (Major)}

5 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.5Qkz4RVJr2Kx3RL6]{Glue Bomb (Greater)}

Quick Bomber.name: Quick Bomber
Quick Bomber.description: Shirota Interacts to draw a bomb, then Strikes with it.

Reactive Bombing.name: Reactive Bombing
Reactive Bombing.description:
Trigger A creature is damaged by one of Zaiho's Strikes

Effect Shirota attacks the triggering creature with a bomb Strike.

Sneak Attack.name: Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: Shirota deals 3d6 extra precision damage with his melee Strikes to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} creatures.

Twinned Combat.name: Twinned Combat
Twinned Combat.description: Any enemy is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} against Shirota's Strikes as long as that enemy is within Zaiho's reach. Shirota doesn't inflict splash damage to Zaiho with his bombs.

equipment-Alchemist's Fire (Greater).name: Alchemist's Fire (Greater)
equipment-Alchemist's Fire (Greater).description:
Activate A Strike

Alchemist's fire is a combination of volatile liquids that ignite when exposed to air. Alchemist's fire deals 3d8 fire damage, 3 persistent fire damage, and 3 fire splash damage. You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls.

equipment-Dread Ampoule (Greater).name: Dread Ampoule (Greater)
equipment-Dread Ampoule (Greater).description:
Activate A Strike

This flask is filled with a murky purple gas that briefly interferes with normal brain activity. A dread ampoule deals 3d6 mental damage and 3 mental splash damage.

On a hit, the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2} on a critical hit. Many types also grant an item bonus to attack rolls.

You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls.

equipment-Glue Bomb (Greater).name: Glue Bomb (Greater)
equipment-Glue Bomb (Greater).description:
Activate 1 Strike

A glue bomb is a harmless explosive mechanism bursting with sticky substances. When you hit a creature with a glue bomb, that creature takes a –15-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 minute. You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls, and the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} DC is 28.

On a critical hit, a creature in contact with a solid surface becomes stuck to the surface and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} for 1 round, and a creature flying via wings has its wings tangled, causing it to fall safely to the ground and become unable to Fly again for 1 round. Glue bombs are not effective when used on a creature that is in water.

The target can end any effects by Escaping or spending a total of 3 Interact actions to carefully remove the sticky substances. These Interact actions don't have to be consecutive, and other creatures can provide the actions as well.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.csA4UAD2tQq7RjT8]{Effect: Glue Bomb (Greater)}

equipment-Explorer's Clothing.name: Explorer's Clothing
equipment-Explorer's Clothing.description: Adventurers who don't wear armor travel in durable clothing. Though it's not armor and uses your unarmored defense proficiency, it still has a Dex Cap and can grant an item bonus to AC if etched with potency runes.

equipment-Crafter's Eyepiece (Greater).name: Crafter's Eyepiece (Greater)
equipment-Crafter's Eyepiece (Greater).description:
This rugged metal eyepiece etched with square patterns is designed to be worn over a single eye. Twisting the lens reveals a faint three-dimensional outline of an item you plan to build or repair, with helpful labels on the component parts.

You gain a +2 item bonus to Crafting checks. When you Repair an item, increase the Hit Points restored to 10 + 10 per proficiency rank on a success or 15 + 15 per proficiency rank on a critical success.

Activate—Prototype 1 minute (manipulate)

Frequency once per day

Effect You calibrate the eyepiece to have it cast a 5th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.TUj8eugNqAvB1vVR]{Creation} spell over the course of 1 minute to construct a temporary item.

equipment-Elixir of Life (Major).name: Elixir of Life (Major)
equipment-Elixir of Life (Major).description:
Activate A (manipulate)

Elixirs of life accelerate a living creature's natural healing processes and immune system. Upon drinking this elixir, you regain @Damage[(8d6+21)[healing]] Hit Points and gain +3 item bonus to saving throws against diseases and poisons for 10 minutes.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.lPRuIRbu0rHBkoKY]{Effect: Elixir of Life}

equipment-Spacious Pouch (Type III).name: Spacious Pouch (Type III)
equipment-Spacious Pouch (Type III).description:
Though it appears to be a cloth bag decorated with panels of richly colored silk or stylish embroidery, a spacious pouch opens into a magical space larger than its outside dimensions. The Bulk held inside the bag doesn't change the Bulk of the spacious pouch itself. The amount of Bulk the bag's extradimensional space can hold depends on its type.

You can Interact with the spacious pouch to stow items in it or remove them just like a mundane sack. Though the bag can hold a great amount of material, an object still needs to be able to fit through the opening of the sack to be stored inside.

If the bag is overloaded or broken, it ruptures and is ruined, causing the items inside to be lost forever. If it's turned inside out, the items inside spill out unharmed, but the bag must be put right before it can be used again. A living creature placed inside the bag has enough air for 10 minutes before it begins to suffocate, and it can attempt to Escape against a DC of 13. An item inside the bag provides no benefits unless it's retrieved first. An item in the bag can't be detected by magic that detects only things on the same plane.

Capacity 100 Bulk

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Poison.name: +1 Status to All Saves vs. Poison

Mantis Commander.name: Mantis Commander
Mantis Commander.description: Mantis Keeper belongs to the animal druidic order, yet they don't have a single animal companion. Instead, they are served by the deadly mantises that dwell upon Mediogalti Isle, and their command over them is bolstered by the Mantis Stones. At any one time, Mantis Keeper is attended by two of these enormous insects, each of which treat Mantis Keeper as a valued ally. Mantis Keeper can communicate with any form of deadly mantis by speaking Wildsong to them, although the mantises cannot reply. These deadly mantises do not have the minion trait, and Mantis Keeper need not Command an Animal to command them—they can simply issue orders via Wildsong as a free action.

Mantis Stone Stride.name: Mantis Stone Stride
Mantis Stone Stride.description: Mantis Keeper Steps, Strides, or Flies into one of the Mantis Stones, then immediately exits a different Mantis Stone into a square adjacent to the stone and continues the rest of their movement. When Mantis Keeper exits a Mantis Stone, they create a pulse of lightning that inflicts @Damage[8d6[electricity]] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:38|basic] save) to all creatures within 10 feet of Mantis Keeper when they emerge from the Mantis stone.

Steady Spellcasting.name: Steady Spellcasting
Steady Spellcasting.description: If a reaction would disrupt Mantis Keeper's spellcasting action, they attempt a @Check[flat|dc:15]. If they succeed, the action isn't disrupted.

Verdant Scythe.name: Verdant Scythe
Verdant Scythe.description: Mantis Keeper has cultivated a unique seed to serve as a special verdant weapon. When they activate this ability, the seed transforms into a scythe, or the scythe transforms back into a seed. This scythe appears to be made entirely of wood, with a short upper blade that extends into a lengthy mantis-like arm when they attack. Although made of wood, Mantis Keeper's verdant scythe functions as if its blade were made of iron. If they're slain, the weapon quickly rots away, leaving behind rune-inscribed seeds that function as runestones that are inscribed with the weapon's qualities.

Implosion.name: Implosion
Implosion.description:
You crush the target by causing it to collapse in on itself, dealing 75 damage. The first time each round you Sustain the spell, you must choose a new target to be subject to the same effect; the same creature can never be targeted more than once with a single casting of this spell. You also can't affect more than one creature per turn with implosion. You can't target a creature that's incorporeal, gaseous, or liquid, or otherwise lacking a solid form.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 10.

Control Weather.description:
Area 2-mile-radius circle centered on you

You alter the weather, making it calm and normal for the season or choosing up to two effects based on the season.

  • Spring drizzle, heat, hurricane, sleet, thunderstorm, tornado
  • Summer drizzle, downpour, extreme heat, hail, heat
  • Autumn cold weather, fog, mild heat, sleet
  • Winter blizzard, mild cold, extreme cold, thaw

You can't specifically control the manifestations, such as the exact path of a tornado or the targets of lightning strikes.

Critical Success You change the weather as desired and can affect a larger area (up to a 5-mile-radius circle), or a longer duration (any number of additional d12 hours, up to 16d12).

Success You change the weather as desired.

Failure You fail to change the weather as desired.

Critical Failure The weather changes in an unanticipated way, determined by the GM but generally as contradictory to your true desires as possible (for instance, a terrible storm emerges when you would prefer good weather).

Heightened (9th) You can create unseasonable weather and contradictory weather effects, such as extreme cold and a hurricane. You can make the weather calm and normal weather for a different season or choose weather effects from any season's list.
Control Weather.name: Control Weather

Wall of Stone.name: Wall of Stone
Wall of Stone.description:
You shape a wall of solid stone. You create a 1-inch-thick wall of stone up to 120 feet long, and 20 feet high. You can shape the wall's path, placing each 5 feet of the wall on the border between squares. The wall doesn't need to stand vertically, so you can use it to form a bridge or set of stairs, for example. You must conjure the wall in an unbroken open space so its edges don't pass through any creatures or objects, or the spell is lost.

Each 10-foot-by-10-foot section of the wall has AC 10, Hardness 14, and 50 Hit Points, and it's immune to critical hits and precision damage. A destroyed section of the wall can be moved through, but the rubble created from it is difficult terrain.

Heightened (+2) The Hit Points of each section of the wall increase by 15.

Fly.name: Fly
Fly.description:
The target can soar through the air, gaining a fly Speed equal to its Speed or 20 feet, whichever is greater.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.MuRBCiZn5IKeaoxi]{Spell Effect: Fly}

Heightened (7th) The duration increases to 1 hour.

Unfettered Movement.name: Unfettered Movement
Unfettered Movement.description: You repel effects that would hinder a creature or slow its movement. While under this spell's effect, the target ignores effects that would give them a circumstance penalty to Speed. When they attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} an effect that has them @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained}, they automatically succeed unless the effect is magical and of a higher rank than the unfettered movement spell.

Blindness.name: Blindness
Blindness.description:
You blind the target. The effect is determined by the target's Fortitude save. The target then becomes temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} until its next turn begins.

Failure The target is Blinded for 1 minute.

Critical Failure The target is Blinded permanently.

Haste.name: Haste
Haste.description:
Magic empowers the target to act faster. It gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} condition and can use the extra action each round only for Strike and Stride actions.

Heightened (7th) You can target up to 6 creatures.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.ElkXovNrHB0Doi6O]{Spell Effect: Haste}

Lightning Bolt.name: Lightning Bolt
Lightning Bolt.description:
A bolt of lightning strikes outward from your hand, dealing 4d12 electricity damage.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d12.

Animal Messenger.name: Animal Messenger
Animal Messenger.description:
You offer food, and an ordinary Tiny animal within range approaches to eat it. You imprint the image, direction, and distance of an obvious place or landmark well known to you within the animal. You can also attach a small object or note up to light Bulk to it. The animal does its best to reach the destination; if it makes it there, it waits nearby and allows nonhostile creatures to approach and remove the attached object. The spell ends after the message is delivered or after 24 hours, whichever comes first.

If there are no Tiny wild animals in range, the spell is lost.

Revealing Light.name: Revealing Light
Revealing Light.description:
A wave of magical light washes over the area. You choose the appearance of the light, such as colorful, heatless flames or sparkling motes. A creature affected by revealing light is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled}. If the creature was @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} instead. If the creature was already concealed for any other reason, it is no longer concealed.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The light affects the creature for 2 rounds.

Failure The light affects the creature for 1 minute.

Critical Failure The light affects the creature for 10 minutes.

Detect Magic.name: Detect Magic
Detect Magic.description:
You send out a pulse that registers the presence of magic. You receive no information beyond the presence or absence of magic. You can choose to ignore magic you're fully aware of, such as the magic items and ongoing spells of you and your allies. You detect illusion magic only if that magic's effect has a lower rank than the rank of your detect magic spell. However, items that have an illusion aura but aren't deceptive in appearance (such as an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.bikFUFRLwfdvX2x2]{Invisibility Potion}) typically are detected normally.

Heightened (3rd) You learn the rank or level of the most powerful magical effect the spell detects, as determined by the GM.

Heightened (4th) As 3rd rank, but you also pinpoint the source of the highest-rank magic. Like for an imprecise sense, you don't learn the exact location, but can narrow down the source to within a 5-foot cube (or the nearest if larger than that).

Electric Arc.name: Electric Arc
Electric Arc.description:
An arc of lightning leaps from one target to another. Each target takes 2d4 electricity damage with a basic Reflex save.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d4.

Stabilize.name: Stabilize
Stabilize.description: Life energy shuts death's door. The target loses the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying} condition, though it remains @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} at 0 Hit Points.

Tangle Vine.name: Tangle Vine
Tangle Vine.description:
A vine appears from thin air, flicking from your hand and lashing itself to the target. Attempt a spell attack roll against the target.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.TwtUIEyenrtAbeiX]{Spell Effect: Tangle Vine}

Critical Success The target gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} condition and takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for 1 round. It can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} against your spell DC to remove the penalty and the immobilized condition.

Success The target takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for 1 round. It can attempt to Escape against your spell DC to remove the penalty.

Failure The target is unaffected.

Heightened (2nd) The effects last for 2 rounds.

Heightened (4th) The effects last for 1 minute.

equipment-Verdant Scythe.name: Verdant Scythe
equipment-Verdant Scythe.description: Derived from a farming tool used to mow down long grains and cereals, this weapon has a long wooden shaft with protruding handles, capped with a curved blade set at a right angle.

Massacre.name: Massacre
Massacre.description:
You unleash a wave of death to snuff out the life force of those in its path. Each living creature of 17th level or lower in the line must attempt a Fortitude save. If the damage from massacre reduces a creature to 0 Hit Points, that creature dies instantly. If massacre doesn't kill even a single creature, the void energy hungrily turns backward toward you, dealing an additional 30 void damage to every living creature in the line (even those above 17th level) and 30 void damage to you.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes 9d6 void damage.

Failure The creature takes 100 void damage.

Critical Failure The creature dies.

Heightened (10th) The spell can affect living creatures up to 19th level. Increase the damage to 10d6 on a success, and to 115 on a failure.

Execute.name: Execute
Execute.description:
You point at a creature and invoke the demise of all things. The target takes 70 void damage with a basic Fortitude save. If the target is undead or otherwise has void healing, the spell loses the death and void traits and gains the vitality trait, and the target takes 70 vitality damage with a basic Fortitude save.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 10.

Regenerate.name: Regenerate
Regenerate.description:
An infusion of vital energy grants a creature continuous healing. The target temporarily gains regeneration 15, which restores 15 Hit Points to it at the start of each of its turns. While it has regeneration, the target can't die from taking Hit Point damage and its @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying} condition can't increase to a value that would kill it (this stops most creatures' dying condition at dying 3), though if its @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded} value becomes 4 or higher, it stays @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} until its wounds are treated. If the target takes acid or fire damage, its regeneration deactivates until after the end of its next turn.

Each time the creature regains Hit Points from regeneration, it also regrows one damaged or ruined organ (if any). During the spell's duration, the creature can also reattach severed body parts by spending an Interact action to hold the body part to the area it was severed from.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.dXq7z633ve4E0nlX]{Spell Effect: Regenerate}

Heightened (9th) The regeneration increases to 20.

Awaken Animal.name: Awaken Animal
Awaken Animal.description:
You grant intelligence to the target, transforming it into a beast. If it was previously an animal companion or minion, it can no longer serve as one.

Critical Success The target's Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma modifiers each increase to +2 if they were lower, and it becomes helpful to you for awakening it.

Success The target's Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma modifiers increase to +0 if they were lower and it becomes friendly to you for awakening it.

Failure You fail to awaken the target.

Critical Failure You accidentally awaken the target with a pure bestial hatred toward you. The target's Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma modifiers increase to -2 if they were lower. It becomes hostile to you, attempting to destroy you.

Creatures Creation Rituals

Creature Level Spell Rank Required Cost
-1 or 0 2 15 gp
1 2 60 gp
2 3 105 gp
3 3 180 gp
4 4 300 gp
5 4 480 gp
6 5 750 gp
7 5 1,080 gp
8 6 1,500 gp
9 6 2,100 gp
10 7 3,000 gp
11 7 4,200 gp
12 8 6,000 gp
13 8 9,000 gp
14 9 13,500 gp
15 9 19,500 gp
16 10 30,000 gp
17 10 45,000 gp

Chain Lightning.name: Chain Lightning
Chain Lightning.description:
You discharge a powerful bolt of lightning at the target, dealing 8d12 electricity damage. The target must attempt a basic Reflex save. The electricity arcs to another creature within 30 feet of the first target, jumps to another creature within 30 feet of that target, and so on. You can end the chain at any point. You can't target the same creature more than once, and you must have line of effect to all targets. Roll the damage only once, and apply it to each target (halving or doubling as appropriate for its saving throw outcome). The chain ends if any one of the targets critically succeeds at its save.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d12.

Commune.name: Commune
Commune.description:
You call upon an unknown, powerful being to answer questions. The being varies depending on the skill used for the primary check.

  • Nature Primal spirits of nature, which know about animals, beasts, fey, fungi, plants, topography, and natural resources within a 3-mile radius.
  • Occultism Planar and other mysterious entities such as elementals, forgotten spirits, and monitors, which know about forgotten knowledge, the planes, obscure secrets, and other esoterica.
  • Religion Divine beings like celestials and fiends that know about the gods they serve and the god's respective purview; these are typically a servitor of your deity if you have one.

You can ask up to seven questions that could be answered with "Yes" or "No." The entity answers with one-word answers such as "Yes," "No," "Likely," and "Unknown," though its answers always reflect its own agenda and could be deceptive.

Critical Success You contact a more powerful entity aligned strongly with your interests, possibly even your deity. The entity won't attempt to deceive you, though it still might not know the answers. When it's important to provide clarity, the entity will answer your questions with up to five words, such as "If you leave immediately" or "That was true once."

Success You can ask your questions and receive answers.

Failure You fail to contact an appropriate being.

Critical Failure You are exposed to the enormity of the cosmos and are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 4} for 1 week (can't remove by any means).

Cursed Metamorphosis.name: Cursed Metamorphosis
Cursed Metamorphosis.description:
You transform the target creature into a harmless animal appropriate to the area, with effects based on its Fortitude save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.
